title: owncloud client device list
body:
currently, i've got lot of oc instances in use: my local desktop pc, my slave desktop pc, my notebook, 2 android tablets, 1 ipad device, 3 computers at clients - all syncing with different versions of the client software. 
but i don't know exactly if the list above is correct since i never see anywhere a list of active sync clients.

that's why i request a device list at the web portal where i can see with which clients i access my oc server.
the list should automatically contain all my clients. if possible, older versions of the clients which don't support the new required api, too. otherwise at least all newer client versions on all device platforms (apple, android, windows, linux, etc.)

the client name should contain the computer name as default, but it should be possible to change the device name for the user. but attention: never should be a duplicate device name
